name: Generic knight from asset store falls through generic mountain from asset store
name_original: Generic knight from asset store falls through generic mountain from asset store
description:
deprecated modes: standard, space, solar, cinematic

in development: battle royale

standard - early version of BR

BR - most thoroughly developed version, still in development, has the most features

space - rotating earth and flying generic knight on the generic mountain

cinematic - "cinematic" camera and physics

solar - flying generic knight in the solar system

GENERICKNIGHTFROMASSETSTORE'S BATTLEGROUNDS controls:

wasd: move

space (hold): jump

SOLAR EDITION CONTROLS:

wasd: move

q/e: lean

numpad 5/8: rotate up/down

STANDARD EDITION CONTROLS:

wasd: move

DOWNLOAD GENERICKNIGHTFROMASSETSTORE'S BATTLEGROUNDS FIRST
